summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nessus-style vulnerability scanner with Turkish/English language support. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend navigation, authentication, and Turkish translations fully functional. Target management, scan creation, and settings pages all operational.

design_issues.issue: Missing 'Toplam Zafiyet' (Total Vulnerabilities) text in dashboard stats cards

passed_tests: Navigation to all pages (Targets, Scans, Users, Settings, Reports)
Dashboard stats display (Toplam Tarama, Aktif Tarama, Toplam Hedef)
